content:
It may have been a while, but we suggest it's time to get back on a bicycle. Navigating Miami Beach by bike means the perfect breeze through your hair, and a perfect breeze to find a parking spot, making it the ultimate way to get around for those not looking to leave the island. Washington Park Hotel gives you access to a fleet of 7 custom Martone bikes, designed to get you where you need to go in style, and have fun doing so.

Bicycle use is included in your daily resort fee and are available on a first-come, first-serve basis.
